entry.title: manakai/perl-web-useragent-functions
entry.summary:
Web::UserAgent::Functions

=head1 NAME

Web::UserAgent::Functions - Easy-to-use functions for HTTP accesses

=head1 SYNOPSIS

use Web::UserAgent::Functions qw(http_get http_post);

my ($req, $res) = http_get url => qhttp://www.example.com/, params => { foo => 'bar', };

my ($req, $res) = http_post url => qhttp://www.example.com/, header_fields => { 'X-Header-Field' => 'value', }, params => { foo => 'bar', };

=head1 DESCRIPTION

USE OF THIS MODULE IS B in favor of L Web::Transport::BasicClient module in the perl-web-resource repository https://github.com/manakai/perl-web-resource/.

This module provides three functions for HTTP access: C<http_get>, C<http_post>, and C<http_post_data>. They are in fact wrappers for LLWP::UserAgent. They accept parameters that describes which resource is how retrieved and return LHTTP::Request and LHTTP::Response objects of the HTTP access.

It adds following features to the original LLWP::UserAgent module:

=over 4

=item - Useful functional interfaces

=item - Avoiding use of SOCKS proxy transparently using LLWP::UserAgent::Curl module

=item - C<application/x-www-form-urlencoded> support

=item - OAuth 1.0 support

=back

=head1 SEE ALSO

LLWP::UserAgent. C<bin/tools/http.pl>.

=head1 AUTHOR

Wakaba wakaba@suikawiki.org.

=head1 HISTORY

This Git repository was located at https://github.com/wakaba/perl-web-useragent-functions.

It was transferred to the manakai project on 22 June 2022.
